ships.name: Seleya
ships.text: When defending, if you have a [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

captains.name: Tavin
captains.text: At any time, you may replace 1 [evade], [scan] or [battlestations] Token beside your ship for 1 [evade], [scan] or [battlestations] Token. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

upgrades.name: V'Tosh Ka'Tur
upgrades.text:
When attacking, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard this card and up to 3 of your other Upgrades and/or Active Shields. Gain +1 attack die for that attack for each Upgrade or Shield you discarded with this ability.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan Captain assigned to a Vulcan ship.

upgrades.name: Solin
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Discard this card to repair up to 2 Shield Tokens.

This Upgrade costs +4 SP if purchased for any non-Vulcan ship.

upgrades.name: Aft Particle Beam
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack.

You may only fire this weapon from your rear firing arc.

upgrades.name: Power Distribution Net
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Disable this card and up to 3 of your Active Shields to immediately perform a green or white maneuver with a speed equal to the number of Shields you disabled with this Action.

This upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Power Distribution Net Upgrade.
